titleStmt.title: The particular state of the government of the Emperour, Ferdinand the Second As it was at his decease in the yeere 1636. Translated out of Latin by R.W.
Status particularis regiminis S.C. Majestatis Ferdinandi II. English.
The particular state of the government of the Emperour, Ferdinand the Second As it was at his decease in the yeere 1636. Translated out of Latin by R.W.
Status particularis regiminis S.C. Majestatis Ferdinandi II. English.
titleStmt.author: R. W., fl. 1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Thomas Nichols, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Popes head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Status particularis regiminis S.C. Majestatis Ferdinandi II.
"The state of the imperiall-court of the Emperour Ferdinand the Second" has separate title page with imprint "London, printed by Anne Griffin. 1637"; register is continuous.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition with Anne Griffin's name in the imprint of the first title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
